title: International Astronomical Union - Wikipedia
snippet: An absolute majority is sufficient for approval in any vote, except for Statute revision which requires a two-thirds majority. An equality of votes is resolved by the vote of the President of the Union. ... Since 1922, the IAU General Assembly meets every three years, except for the period between 1938 and 1948, due to World War II.

title: Presidency — International Association of Universities
snippet: Read the President’s Message here. IAU President 2016-2022 Pam Fredmam and IAU President 2022-2026 Andrew Deeks

title: 2025 IAU Election Results and New Council Announcement - IAU - International Association of Ultrarunners
snippet: Nadeem Khan was re-elected as President, while Jacek Bedkowski and Robert Boyce assume new roles as Vice President and Treasurer, respectively. Hilary Walker was re-elected and continues as General Secretary.

title: Governance Structure - IAU
snippet: The Executive Committee is composed of the President and four Vice-Presidents (representing each region of the world). It meets twice a year. The vice-presidents are designated by the President from among the Administrative Board members and their nomination is approved by the Administrative Board.

title: Executive Committee
snippet: Welcome to the New IAU Environment! Thank you for your patience as we continue to build our site. The Executive Committee consists of the President of the Union, the President-Elect, six Vice-Presidents , the General Secretary, and the Assistant General Secretary elected by the General Assembly on the proposal of the Special Nominating Committee (SNC) .
